root.title: liberti star usa set initi payout
root.body: liberti star equiti fund sai declar initi dividend five ct per share payabl april two sharehold record march 20 sai dividend includ quarterli dividend three ct share special payout two ct share cover period novemb three 1986 fund begin oper decemb 31 1986 fund sai quarterli dividend rate mai fluctuat futur
